response: "{ \"title\": \"Easy: Check if a Number is Divisible by 3\", \"description\": \"A number is divisible by 3 when the sum of its digits is also divisible by 3. Write a function `is_divisible_by_3` that takes an integer as input and returns `True` if it's divisible by 3, `False` otherwise.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef is_divisible_by_3(n: int) -> bool:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `n` (int): A positive integer.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns `True` if the input number is divisible by 3, `False` otherwise.\", \"code\": \"def is_divisible_by_3(n: int) -> bool:\\n    # Calculate the sum of digits in the number\\n    sum_digits = sum(int(digit) for digit in str(n))\\n    # Check if the sum of digits is divisible by 3\\n    return sum_digits % 3 == 0,\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert is_divisible_by_3(9) == True\", \"assert is_divisible_by_3(12) == True\", \"assert is_divisible_by_3(17) == False\", \"assert is_divisible_by_3(27) == True\"] }"
